Text:
Thanks for the update!!

REQ RESEED: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3525584/FS2004_-_FS2Crew_ATR_Edition

Thanks for the upload!!!
any chance of packing the patch only for those who already have the installer?

barp

  only the full upgrade supplied
Harls: fantastic addon and SO glad to get the update.  Thanks a lot!
thanks man, updates are always more than welcome :)
Harls: just a quick question.... Is this a FULL Vancouver+ that's already version 1.1?  Or is it version 1.0 with the patch to 1.1 packaged with it?  Thanks again for any info.

Britney
Guess it was patched by the author but supplied
as a full version
Harls: wait a minute... this is a rip, then?
Britney:   Not necessarily - it is not uncommon for authors to insist on a full version even if patched.
Harls: True, true. I guess the only way to find out is to complete the download. :)  Sure is slow tonight, though.

REQ: LIONHEART - SOCATA TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO COLLECTION

Karel

Harls: well, hate to tell you this buddy, but you uploaded the ****1.0**** version. I have installed it and confirmed that it is the OLD version. The Vancouver+ configurator does not report it's v1.1; and, just to confirm, ALL the file dates on all the installed files are dated 2005 and before.  Sorry, but this is the old version.  :(

Harls: o.k., forget what I wrote above. You have, indeed, uploaded the right version! It was my error as I accidentally re-installed the old version (someone else I read elsewhere had this problem, too!).  THANKS VERY MUCH for this timely upload, Harls.  You da man!
BRITNEY!!!  No wonder your hubby's divorcing you! lol

Does anyone have the FSX version of the Vancouver+ scenery.

This is one of the best addons
Awesome work. I would have bought it but charging  40 Euros for a Canadian living in Vancouver is a kick in the face.  This install works.  Cheers
